content: Quando è stata l'ultima volta che hai chiesto aiuto a qualcuno?
translations: eng:When was the last time that you asked somebody for help﹖
eng:When was the last time that you asked someone for help﹖
eng:When was the last time you asked somebody for help﹖
eng:When was the last time you asked someone for help﹖
